About Rachel Tschanz

More About Me

Hi! I'm Rachel. I was born and raised in sunny Colorado. I am a fervent learner, life-long artist and curious cat. I am a natural and skilled problem solver; nothing feels better than breaking through a wall that has held you back for too long (like the Kool-aid man?). I love the challenge of getting every tiny CSS detail just right. My idea of a good time is debating, Googling every fleeting curiosity, reading long Reddit discussions, and falling down wikipedia rabbit holes.

My Interests

  • Animals - I have many
  • Plants - also numerous
  • Technology
  • DIY
  • New experiences
  • Ways to make the world better than you found it

Recommendations

"...Throughout her 6-year tenure as a designer at Madwire®, Rachel consistently produced excellent work and demonstrated a knack for creative problem solving. She was able to quickly learn new platforms and processes in our fast-paced environment while continuously delivering high-quality design work. Rachel is also a strong collaborator, and she always made a positive impact on our team culture through her constant support of her teammates."


- Josh Felix, Lead Designer at Madwire®

"...Rachel... was a valuable addition to our team. She has a strong work ethic and experience working with a variety of clients and industries. She produced high quality designs across various disciplines...Rachel also has a vast knowledge of digital marketing best practices, user experience, unique website platforms and Adobe products. She adapted well to a constantly changing industry and always had a great attitude."


- Brittany Jackson, Creative Director at Madwire®
